page.title: 14OUR ANCESTORS
page.content: The origins of the people of Cwmbran New Town. A survey. At first we sent the children home with a questionnaire asking the children where they themselves, their parents and grandparents were born. We were trying to find out if their parents or grandparents had any connection with Gwent, before the new town was built. Out of the 70 children in the survey 58 were born in Gwent, a clearly high proportion. It seems very few people are coming to live here with their families from far away. Of the children questioned over 60 were born in Wales, 8 children were born in England and 1 child was born in South Africa. Out of the 70 children questioned, 29 sets of parents were...
